Florian Hartmann

I'm a Master student with a focus on machine learning. Currently, I'm spending my time on Federated Learning. Previously, I worked on NLP at Amazon, and on differential privacy and recommender systems at Mozilla.

Other than that, I occasionally like to develop apps, such as a clipboard manager or a Hacker News client. Before I got into machine learning, I published several popular JavaScript libraries.
